dimension:
34 1/4 x 13 3/8 in. (87 x 34 cm) (image)
67 11/16 x 18 1/8 in. (172 x 46 cm) (mount) 51 cm W w/rollers
inscription:
Waka poem

Kaze fuke ba
oki tsu shiranami
Tatsutayama
yowa ni ha kimi ga
hitori ko yu ran

When wind blows
white wave beat uon the Naniwa bay.
I\'m worried about the lover
who may be travelling though Tatsuta Mountain at night
in order to come to see me.
(tans. YKT)
medium: Ink, color, and gold on paper
title: Beauty Standing on a Veranda
